item.title: About Me
item.dc:creator: superuser
item.content:encoded:
Who Am I

Entrepreneur

As an entrepreneur, I navigate the complexities of the business world with innovation and determination. Embracing challenges, I drive growth and create value. My journey involves constant learning and adapting, always striving for excellence and impact. The entrepreneurial spirit fuels my passion to transform ideas into reality, pushing boundaries, and inspiring change.

EXPERIENCES

WordPress Developer

Creator and Product Director at IdeaFlow

Java Developer

Creator and Product Director at IdeaFlow

PHP Developer

Creator and Product Director at IdeaFlow

CSS Developer

Creator and Product Director at IdeaFlow

Front-End Developer

Creator and Product Director at IdeaFlow

JavaScript Developer

Creator and Product Director at IdeaFlow

item.title: Blog Home
item.dc:creator: superuser
item.content:encoded:
Leverage Your Future

It's me Larry Jonathan

As an entrepreneur, I navigate the complexities of the business world with innovation and determination. Embracing challenges, I drive growth and create value. My journey involves constant learning and adapting, always striving for excellence and impact.

About Me

Why me ?

Checkout MY Awesome Skills

I have acquired skills in identifying market opportunities and taking the initiative to create and grow businesses.

WordPress Developer

I a skilled WordPress Developer with over three years of experience. Has Proficiency in plugin development, theme customization, and designing web pages using Elementor

Plugin Developer

I am skilled in WordPress theme development, with the ability to create custom themes tailored to specific needs. This expertise includes designing and coding themes from scratch.

PHP Developer

I am skilled in WordPress plugin development, capable of creating custom plugins to extend WordPress functionality. This includes knowledge of PHP, hooks, filters.

HTML, CSS, JS

I am skilled in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, enabling the creation of visually appealing and interactive web pages. These skills are fundamental for front-end web development, allowing the structuring, styling, and dynamic behavior of websites.

PHP

It is proficient in PHP, enabling him to create dynamic web applications and perform server-side scripting effectively. MY expertise includes developing custom functionalities and integrations for WordPress

Elementor

I am skilled in using Elementor, WordPress page builder plugin that allows for easy drag-and-drop editing and customization of websites. I has extensive experience in designing and developing web pages with Elementor,.

More Skills
More Posts

Featured Portfolio

item.excerpt:encoded: Displays the latest posts as either the site homepage or as the "Posts page" as defined under reading settings. If it exists, the Front Page template overrides this template when posts are shown on the homepage.

item.title: How to Develop a Business Idea from Scratch
item.dc:creator: superuser
item.content:encoded:
Introduction: Discuss the importance of having a unique and viable business idea.

Identifying a Market Gap: Tips on researching and finding unmet needs in the market.

Brainstorming Techniques: Methods like mind mapping, SWOT analysis, and brainstorming sessions.

Validating Your Idea: Steps to test and validate the business idea through surveys, MVPs, and feedback.

Conclusion: Encouraging entrepreneurs to stay persistent and open to iteration.

item.title: Essential Skills
item.dc:creator: superuser
item.content:encoded:
Introduction: Highlight the importance of skill development for entrepreneurs.

Leadership and Management: Discuss the significance of strong leadership and effective management.

Financial Literacy: Understanding financial statements, budgeting, and financial planning.

Marketing and Sales: Basics of marketing strategies and sales techniques.

Networking and Negotiation: Importance of building relationships and negotiation skills.

Conclusion: Encourage continuous learning and skill enhancement.

item.title: How to Develop a Business Idea from Scratch
item.dc:creator: superuser
item.content:encoded:
Introduction: Discuss the importance of having a unique and viable business idea.

Identifying a Market Gap: Tips on researching and finding unmet needs in the market.

Brainstorming Techniques: Methods like mind mapping, SWOT analysis, and brainstorming sessions.

Validating Your Idea: Steps to test and validate the business idea through surveys, MVPs, and feedback.

Conclusion: Encouraging entrepreneurs to stay persistent and open to iteration.

item.title: Challenges of Startup Funding
item.dc:creator: superuser
item.content:encoded:
Introduction: The importance of securing funding for startups.

Types of Funding: Explore different funding options like bootstrapping, angel investors, venture capital, crowdfunding, etc.

Preparing for Investment: Creating a solid business plan, pitch deck, and financial projections.

Approaching Investors: Tips on how to find and approach potential investors.

Managing Funds: Effective management of funds post-investment.

Conclusion: Encourage thorough research and strategic planning for successful
